name: Bringer of Sin
resistance: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Aura of Pain
traits.desc: A creature that deals damage to the bringer while within 30 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Light Seeker
traits.desc: The bringer knows the exact location of any good creature within 1000 feet.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The bringer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bringer makes two melee attacks, one of which may be a punishing strike.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) necrotic damage if the creature is good.

actions.name: Punishing Strike (3/Day)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage plus half of the total damage that creature dealt to the bringer with its last attack as bonus necrotic damage.

actions.name: Wave of Necrosis (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The bringer lets loose a blast of necrotic energy in a 60 foot cone. Each creature allied with the bringer regains 50 hit points and each enemy must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
